change.ab: s1: Corrected "Reuilly" to "Neuilly" in address s4: Encoded "Feb 29" as "Feb 28" because TEI wouldn't accept it Changed "Best Short Stories 1951" to "1931"

div.head: 1931 SHELDON Cherest Cherrest Maillot 26-78 Mr James Sheldon 16 rue Pierre Cherest (guaranty Trust) Neuilly - sur Seine
